thread.title: Justin Bieber Plays Impromptu Mini-Concert With Floyd Mayweather, Jr. in Bora Bora
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Plays Impromptu Mini-Concert With Floyd Mayweather, Jr. in Bora Bora

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Justin Bieber Plays Impromptu Mini-Concert With Floyd Mayweather, Jr. in Bora Bora
text:
Comments The Canadian superstar performs his newest hit 'What Do You Mean?' and a cover of The Beatles' Let It Be' for a small crowd at his hotel's bar. 
Following his visit to New Zealand, Justin Bieber joined his friend Floyd Mayweather, Jr. for a vacation in French Polynesia. While in Bora Bora over the weekend, the Canadian singer surprised a small crowd at their hotel's bar when he unexpectedly treated them to a mini-concert. According to a brief video taken by someone in the audience, Bieber kicked off his impromptu set with his latest hit "What Do You Mean?" while Mayweather stood next to him and clapped his hands to the beat. The 21-year-old hottie then slowed things down as he sat on a piano and sang a cover of The Beatles ' "Let It Be". Bieber is enjoying his time in Bora Bora as he gears up to release his comeback album, which he recently revealed would be titled " Purpose ". The follow-up to 2012's " Believe " is led by "What Do You Mean" which made its debut at No. 1 on Billboard Hot 100 following its release in late August.
